name: Agents of Disability
description:
Description

Agent 18, the only spy with a disability must find his way into the headquarters of the elusive Gentlemen Club who are attempt to bring an end to the LGBTQ+ parade that is to commence at dawn. To do this Agent 18 must build ramps into the building. The Gentlemen’s club have prepared for Agent 18, and have laid traps leading to their building. Agent 18 will have to test the placement of his ramps by using a tactical wheel-chair with a sack of flour in it, this is because flour has a similar weight to a fully-grown person.  The goal of the character is to make it to the end of each level with the least cost possible, as well as the most stars. The overall goal of the game is stop the Gentlemen’s club from bringing a stop to the pride parade. 

Controls

Move left or right with ‘A’ and ‘D’

Jump with ‘Space’

Objective

 to reach the end of the level without being stopped, collect the as many coins as possible.
